summary: Snake-Crane Secret is a tale of deceit, lying and mistrust. A family tries to uphold their honor, while keeping their Sacred Kung-Fu book from getting into the wrong hands.
cast: Fei Meng|Tao-Liang Tan|Tien-Lung Yu|Hui-Shan Yang|Fang Fang|Li Tung|Dean Shek|Peng Chiao|Lung Hou|Cheung Chen Huan|Ming Lei|Chao Li|Kun Li|Szu-Cheng Mu|Hsieh Wang|Jo-Ping Wang|Ryong Wang|Wu Ma
keywords: book|secret|kung fu|crane the bird|martial arts training
director: Director: Wu Ma (as Fung Wo Ma)
title: She hao dan xin zhen jiu zhou
